subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
lead_paragraph: The Jets do have a defensive coordinator and his name is not Rex Ryan, it is Mike Pettine. “I’m not in it for the credit,” he said. “I only want a ring.”
snippet: The Jets do have a defensive coordinator and his name is not Rex Ryan, it is Mike Pettine. “I’m not in it for the credit,” he said. “I only want a ring.”
